DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effect of 3 doses of sublingual house dust mite (HDM) tablets versus placebo in the change from baseline of rhinitis total symptom score during the allergen chamber challenge before and after 6 months of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of 100IR, 300IR, 500IR Sublingual House Dust Mite (HDM) Tablets in Allergic Rhinitis Environment Exposure Chamber Model
DOC.criteria: history of HDM rhinitis allergy for > 1 year sensitized to D. pteronyssinus and/or D. farinae RTSS >= 6 at least 2 time points during allergen challenge session co sensitization to other allergen than HDM FEV1 < 80% Asthma GINA > 1
